verses.roman:
jala-dasyu-bhaye sei yavana calila
daśa naukā bhari' bahu sainya saṅge nila

synonyms: jala-dasyu-bhaye—because of fearing pirates; sei—that; yavana—Mohammedan governor; calila—went along; daśa naukā bhari'-filling ten boats; bahu—many; sainya—soldiers; saṅge—with him; nila—took.
translation: The Mohammedan governor then personally accompanied Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. Because of pirates, the governor took ten boats, which were full with many soldiers.
